changes.description: Improve set details performance
Fix loading indicator freeze when parsing sets
Fix layout issues on small screens
Change app logo and splash screen
Support background refresh on iOS
Refactor notification settings
Add material expressive design
Improved set updating using data batches
Implemented theme list screen
Implemented CMF scanner with detection overlay
Added large grid view option for set list screen
Create, edit, delete set collections
Display changelog on dashboard screen
Redesign theme and packaging type selectors
Added expiration for additional images and instructions
Update dependencies
Added more featd themes
Arriving sets featd row
Update sets periodically in the background on Android
Improved set searching and filtering, display sets by appearance
Missing bottom padding on SetDetailScreen layout
Initial version
